27 template <class PointType, class NormalType>
28 void nimbus::cloudRecognition<PointType, NormalType>::modelConstruct(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob)
29 {
30  this->cloudNormalEstimationOMP(blob);
31  this->cloudUniformSampling(blob);
32  this->cloudSHOTEstimationOMP(blob);
33  this->cloudBoardLocalRefeFrame(blob);
34  mData.normal = this->normalOut;
35  mData.keypoint = this->keypointOut;
36  mData.descriptor = this->shotOut;
37  ROS_ERROR("Model decriptor size %d", (int)mData.descriptor->points.size());
38  //ros::Duration(5).sleep();
39  mData.blRefence = this->referenceOut;
40 }

42 template <class PointType, class NormalType>
43 void nimbus::cloudRecognition<PointType, NormalType>::cloudCorrespondence(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob)
44 {
45  //pcl::CorrespondencesPtr model_scene_corr (new pcl::Correspondences());
46  this->cloudNormalEstimationOMP(blob);
47  this->cloudUniformSampling(blob);
48  this->cloudSHOTEstimationOMP(blob);
49  this->cloudBoardLocalRefeFrame(blob);
50  model_scene_corr.reset(new pcl::Correspondences());
51  pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::SHOT352> match_search;
52  match_search.setInputCloud(mData.descriptor);
53  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < this->shotOut->size(); ++i){
54  std::vector<int> neigh_indices(1);
55  std::vector<float> neigh_sqrt_distance(1);
56 
57  if(! std::isfinite(this->shotOut->at (i).descriptor[0])){
58  continue;
59  }
60 
61  int found_neighs = match_search.nearestKSearch(this->shotOut->at (i), 1, neigh_indices, neigh_sqrt_distance);
62  if(found_neighs == 1 && neigh_sqrt_distance[0] < 0.25f){
63  pcl::Correspondence corr(neigh_indices[0], static_cast<int> (i), neigh_sqrt_distance[0]);
64  model_scene_corr->push_back(corr);
65  }
66  }
67  ROS_INFO("Correspondence found: %d", (int)model_scene_corr->size());
68 }
69 
70 template <class PointType, class NormalType>
71 void nimbus::cloudRecognition<PointType, NormalType>::cloudHough3D(const pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::ConstPtr blob,
72  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > &rototranslations,
73  std::vector<pcl::Correspondences> &clustered_corrs)
74 {
75  cloudCorrespondence(blob);
76  pcl::Hough3DGrouping<PointType, PointType, pcl::ReferenceFrame, pcl::ReferenceFrame> clusterer;
77  clusterer.setHoughBinSize (cg_size_);
78  clusterer.setHoughThreshold (cg_thresh_);
79  clusterer.setUseInterpolation (true);
80  clusterer.setUseDistanceWeight (false);
81 
82  clusterer.setInputCloud (mData.keypoint);
83  clusterer.setInputRf (mData.blRefence);
84  clusterer.setSceneCloud (this->keypointOut);
85  clusterer.setSceneRf (this->referenceOut);
86  clusterer.setModelSceneCorrespondences (model_scene_corr);
87 
88  clusterer.recognize (rototranslations, clustered_corrs);
89 }
